​ dust3d.desktop ​ FSFAP ​ MIT ​ Dust3D ​ A quick 3D modeling tool ​ ​ ​
​ Dust3D is a brand new 3D modeling software. It helps you create a 3D watertight base model in seconds. Use it to speed up your character modeling in game making, 3D printing, and so on. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ Dust3D main window ​ https://raw.githubusercontent.com/huxingyi/dust3d/master/ci/screenshot.png ​ ​ ​ ​ https://github.com/huxingyi/dust3d https://github.com/huxingyi/dust3d/issues http://docs.dust3d.org/ ​ ​
